description: Learn the core concepts of multimedia systems, including audio, video, graphics, data compression, and application design.

Image formats and processing: analysis, transmission, graphics systems
Animation: input, composition, controlling methods, display
Compression techniques: Huffman, Run-length, JPEG, MPEG
User interfaces: video/audio integration, user-friendly design
Programming: libraries, toolkits, higher languages, object-oriented approaches
Media integration: editors, authoring tools, interactive services
Applications: telemedicine, e-learning, video conferencing, video-on-demand

Video
Graphics
Data Compression
Application Design
